name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: The iPhone 15 Pro is the latest and greatest iPhone model. It has a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, the A16 Bionic chip, and a triple-camera system with LiDAR Scanner. It also supports 5G and has a MagSafe connector for easy wireless charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 is the latest flagship smartphone from Samsung. It has a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, the Exynos 2200 chip, and a quad-camera system with 100x Space Zoom. It also supports 5G and has a 5000mAh battery.

name: MacBook Air M2
description: The MacBook Air M2 is the latest MacBook model. It has a 13.3-inch Retina display, the M2 chip, and up to 16GB of RAM. It also has a Magic Keyboard, Touch ID, and up to 2TB of storage.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 is the latest wireless noise-canceling headphones from Sony. They have industry-leading noise cancellation, 40mm drivers, and up to 30 hours of battery life. They also support LDAC and have a Speak-to-Chat feature.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: The Apple Watch Series 9 is the latest smartwatch from Apple. It has an always-on Retina display, the S9 chip, and up to 48 hours of battery life. It also has advanced health features like ECG and blood oxygen monitoring.
